summary: The year it took Dede Fortin to write and record "Dehors Novembre" is revisited in this doc. Swinging between crippling despair and fervent creativity, the past that haunted Fortin until ... See full summary »
cast: Sébastien Ricard|Joseph Mesiano|Dimitri Storoge|Bénédicte Décary|David Quertigniez|Claudia Ferri|Mélissa Désormeaux-Poulin|Louis Saia|Yan Rompré|Jonathan Charbonneau|Mathieu Handfield|Marie-Laurence Moreau|Eugénie Beaudry|Pénéloppe Bourgoin|Isabelle Brouillette|Pierre-Yves Cardinal|Julie Carrier-Prévost|Sandrine Dugas|Sophie Froment|Alexandre L'heureux|Ève Landry|Luc Senay|Sara Sue Vallee|Paul Gillot|Claude Huard
title: Dédé, à travers les brumes
